name: Seaboy
description:
Under the sea a group a evil sea creatures are attacking in the ocean by the Squid King, Your player Seaboy has to beat those evil sea creatures, you can punch and kick to beat up those sea creatures, once you beat up enough sea creatures the big squid appears. There are bubbles to pop to score, There are seven levels in this game, when you beat it all levels your the star of the game, you have three lives and when points up to 5000 you earn a life, now make the ocean peaceful.

Created by Brian Kirsch

2019 ©ARvision
